text: Norma Egstrom (May 26, 1920 - January 21, 2002) was an American actress and jazz singer. She is better known as Peggy Lee. She acted in many movies. She also wrote the music for them. She sang and acted for six decades. Lee was born in Jamestown, North Dakota. Category:American movie actors Category:1920 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Actors from North Dakota Category:Singers from North Dakota
title: Peggy Lee
